The first post that I'm not going to write...

06 Jan 2013

...is this one.

...or this one.

So we're just going to skip that whole thing this time, okay good good.

I always feel like if music hadn't snatched my nerd up, I would have ended up a coder somewhere along the way... I remember my dos commands and qbasic from waaaaaay back, Â but while Mia was across the street from me writing javascript frames (remember that especially ugly one with the rotating 3d peace sign? Jesus.), the best I could ever muster was a geocities page with a maroon background and a grainy photo of some guy doing a grind.

(I've always wished I could find that page, again, but since that is impossible, I've recreated it here. Shut up, whatever, I was thirteen.)
